actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend the authority of the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to make grants to certain medical schools and other health manpower institutions.

summary.text: Extends the authorization of appropriations to fiscal year 1984 for grants to medical schools and other health manpower institutions affiliated with the Veterans' Administration.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend the authority of the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to make grants to certain medical schools and other health manpower institutions.
